title: "About Us"
---

The ART Lab was started in 2017 at the University of South Florida. This lab is led by Dr. Robert Sclauch, PhD. The ART Lab is a research lab that focuses on the development of new technologies for the treatment of mental health disorders. The ART Lab is a part of the Department of Psychology at the University of South Florida. The ART Lab is located in the USF College of Behavioral and Community Sciences.
